price: Na wanakupeni furaha pale mnapo warudisha jioni na mnapo wapeleka malishoni asubuhi.
arabic: وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا جَمَالٌ حِينَ تُرِيحُونَ وَحِينَ تَسۡرَحُونَ
footnotes: Na mnapata kwao raha na furaha mnapo waona wanarejea kutoka machungani na matumbo yao na viwele vimejaa, na mnapo toka nao kwenda makondeni na machungani wakikimbilia malisha yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walakum fīhā jamālun ḥīna turīḥūna waḥīna tasraḥūna
